mapper.update: INSERT INTO t_follow_statistics (user_id, following_count, follower_count, created_time, updated_time) VALUES (#{userId}, 1, 0, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE following_count = following_count + 1, updated_time = NOW()
UPDATE t_follow_statistics SET following_count = GREATEST(following_count - 1, 0), updated_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}

INSERT INTO t_follow_statistics (user_id, following_count, follower_count, created_time, updated_time) VALUES (#{userId}, 0, 1, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE follower_count = follower_count + 1, updated_time = NOW()
UPDATE t_follow_statistics SET follower_count = GREATEST(follower_count - 1, 0), updated_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}

INSERT INTO t_follow_statistics (user_id, following_count, follower_count, created_time, updated_time) VALUES ( #{userId}, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_follow WHERE follower_user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1), (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_follow WHERE followed_user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1), NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE following_count = (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_follow WHERE follower_user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1), follower_count = (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_follow WHERE followed_user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1), updated_time = NOW()
